attributes.action: Parliament should call on TV providers to provide free access to all channels
attributes.additional_details: The cable etc companies can play their part in facilitating compliance with “stay at home” calls.
attributes.background: To ensure free provision of entertainment to those restricted to their home during Covid 19 isolation.

rejection.details:
The provision of subscription television services is a matter for individual subscription providers, not the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
